tag.description: Tags to add to the document. When tag array property is provided, tags that are in this array will be added. If tag is not provided or empty then no updates/inserts of tags will occur.

untag.description: Tags to remove from the document. When untag array property is provided, tags that are in this array will be removed from the document. If untag property is empty or not provided then no removal of tags will occur.

untag.description: Tags to remove from the document. When untag array property is provided, tags that are in this array will be removed from the document. If untag property is empty or not provided then no removal of tags will occur.

business_value.description: business value of the asset, should be a number of a scale 1 to 10

risk.description: risk related to the asset should be a number (float) from 1 - 10
risk.error_message: Invalid risk value: %. Value must be between 0 and 10

family_name.description: The family name of the user, or typically the last name in most western languages.

given_name.description: The given name of the user, or typically the first name in most western languages.

user_category.description: User Category - employee, vendor, customer, etc

active.description: True if the person is active

modified.description: Last time when data source definition was modified. epoch in milliseconds

current_score.description: Risk score from recent risk analysis

first_occurrence.description: Epoch Time when first risk was seen

last_occurrence.description: Epoch Time when latest risk was seen
